mapper.insert: insert into educounse (eduCounse_title, eduCounse_content, eduCounse_img, exercise_id) values (#{eduCounseTitle}, #{eduCounseContent}, #{eduCounseImg}, #{exerciseId});
mapper.select: select eduCounse_title, eduCounse_content, eduCounse_img, exercise_id , eduCounse_id from educounse where eduCounse_title=#{eduCounseTitle};
SELECT t.eduCounse_id, t.eduCounse_content, t.create_time, t.eduCounse_title, t.eduCounse_img FROM `educounse` t;
SELECT t.eduCounse_id, t.eduCounse_title, t.create_time, t.eduCounse_content, t.eduCounse_img FROM `educounse` t where t.eduCounse_id=#{eduCounseId};
mapper.update: Update educounse t set t.eduCounse_content=#{eduCounseContent}, t.eduCounse_title=#{eduCounseTitle}, t.eduCounse_img = #{eduCounseImg} where t.eduCounse_id = #{eduCounseId};
